CutSceneText.Text: Do you know how to speak Elyos?
Gaphyr Teriterirashe, smart. Can speak Elyos.
I have something to ask about Tursin Krall...
Is that right... Where is the head of those Tursin Krall?
Hm... Then will you tell me if I do something for you in return?
At the [Barat Subterranean Heat Area], [Vein of Flame], I have younger brother. Have not seen him for long, locked up here.
I am sorry, but I can't set you free.
Then I talk, if you give this to my brother.
Is that right? I'll do that, once I complete this mission.
Many cave camps at the [Ishalgen Wilderness Krall Encampment]. The one to southeast is the boss [Shandu]'s.
That's right. I will keep my promise with you.
Thank you. You are a good Elyos!
